NGCHM is an R package for creating Next-Generation Clustered Heat Maps (NG-CHMs). NG-CHMs allow for a dynamic exploration of heat map data in a web browser.

Other NG-CHM resources include:

  • NG-CHM Home Page
  • YouTube Channel
  • NG-CHM GUI Builder for creating NG-CHMs without programming

To learn how to create a NG-CHM using this R package, click Getting Started.

NG-CHM of Breast Cancer (BRCA) Data from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA)
